full_summary:
# UPS Battery Replacement at Millhaven Institution

## Tender Information

### Title
* English: UPS Batteries - Millhaven Institution
* French: Batteries UPS - Institution Millhaven

### Solicitation Number
21421-23-4419876-001-001

### Contracting Entity
Contracting and Material Services - Ontario

### Overview
This request for proposal (RFP) is issued by the Correctional Service of Canada for the replacement of all Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) and Always On batteries at Millhaven Institution. The existing system batteries have exceeded their life cycle, and this system is critical for maintaining door and barrier control as well as emergency lighting during a power failure.

### Summary of Work
The contractor will replace the UPS and Always On batteries, including but not limited to:

* Supply and installation of 75 SLA12-75 or equivalent batteries
* Supply and installation of 140 S12V285 or equivalent batteries
* Replace batteries in designated areas (A Unit, T Building, E Unit, J Unit, S Building (Hospital), U building, and Y Unit (RTC))
* Ensure all systems are returned to normal operating condition
* Dispose of removed batteries in an environmentally friendly manner, following required regulations

### Key Dates
* Tender Closing Date: July 12, 2023 10:00:00 AM
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 17, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: September 28, 2023

### Solicitation Details
* Tendering procedures: open bidding
* Competitive procurement strategy: lowest priced compliant bid
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada's free trade agreements with Chile, Colombia, Honduras, and Panama
* Security requirements: none
* Comprehensive land claim agreement: none

## Contact Information
To obtain further information or clarification, please contact:
Robin Riha, Contracting and Material Services - Ontario
robin.riha@csc-scc.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 328-9727
Address: 445 Union Street, Kingston, ON K7L 4Y8
